description: Primary web server for production website
Primary database server - MySQL cluster node 1
Guest WiFi access point - Lobby area
DMZ API server - Public REST API
Primary data center server - Hypervisor host
Secondary data center server - Hypervisor host
Broadcast address - Reserved by network protocol
Network address - Reserved by network protocol
Expired test server - Should be reclaimed
Expired backup server - Replaced by new system
NTP time server - Network time synchronization
